body_html:
@ericox The internal google equivalent of this tracing uses the /job:worker/task:7 style prefixes so that the GPU hardware tracing appears next to the 'software tracing' for devices on the same worker in the timeline visualizations. (The TensorFlow worker's environment probably has the correct name in it somewhere)

I'm not sure yet if the chrome trace viewer code will correctly preserve the sort-order, but if not it's an easy fix...

Please let me know if any of this end up being more difficult than expected (this has been on my TODO list for a while!)
